COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c
STRING: Perhaps it was because it was the day before Natale,
but there were a lot of people coming and going in
town.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168
STRING: Most people would be going to church tomorrow, and
shops tended to be closed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174
STRING: The devout would often spend the time from tonight
until mass tomorrow, in silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a
STRING: As I was not as devout as others, I would of course visit
the church for prayer tomorrow, but would most likely
not spend the eve of Natale in quiet preparation for
prayer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa
STRING: Averting my eyes from the people that passed by, I
looked through a familiar window and checked the time
on the clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0
STRING: [Chris] “Still got plenty of time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6
STRING: Unconsciously listening to the sound of the rain hitting
the shelter I stood under, I suddenly realized I had
forgotten about the existence of the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec
STRING: I had heard that the human body had a function to shut
out noise and other constant sounds after a given
period of time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c
STRING: I could kind of understand why the people in this town
were indifferent to the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: I supposed that I too was becoming the same, after the
months and years I had spent here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238
STRING: I focused my hearing, and extended my hand, feeling
the rain land on it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244
STRING: The minuscule particles of the drizzly rain danced about
in the wind, dampening the palm of my hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a
STRING: I thought I would get cold if I did it for too long, and I
eventually pulled my hand back in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278
STRING: [Fal] “What are you doing, Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc
STRING: [Fal] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f2
STRING: [Chris] “Morning. That was quick!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324
STRING: [Fal] “Really? I thought you only just made it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a
STRING: [Chris] “I thought you might have to help out with
something again, like last time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: [Fal] “That's definitely not going to happen today. So?
What were you doing just now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: [Chris] “I was just... Feeling the rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: [Fal] “That's weird.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Chris] “When it rains like this everyday, I sometimes
forget it exists.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8
STRING: [Fal] “That... Never happens to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fe
STRING: [Chris] “Weren't you from around here, Fal? Actually,
speaking of which, we've never really talked about this
kind of thing, have we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43a
STRING: [Fal] “Now that you mention it, no, we haven't. But, my
place isn't far away, so let's just talk there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a6
STRING: [Chris] “So, this is your place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d8
STRING: [Fal] “Come on in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ee
STRING: Once through the door, Fal handed me a dry, clean
towel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x502
STRING: [Fal] “You used one last time, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x518
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x530
STRING: After quickly drying my hair and using the towel on my
face, I noticed the towel had a nice dry fragrance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e
STRING: [Fal] “Once you're done, feel free to leave the towel
wherever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x564
STRING: Upon wiping the droplets of water from my Fortelle
case, I unfolded it and placed it carefully on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: I couldn't quite see from here, but it seemed that Fal
was doing something in the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x590
STRING: I looked around the room once more... And noticed
that it wasn't particularly... Feminine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a6
STRING: Well, I hadn't imagined her room to be especially
feminine, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5bc
STRING: Perhaps the impression I got was due to the overall lack
of things in the room?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c8
STRING: In that respect it was quite similar to my place, so I was
hardly one to talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: [Fal] “What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x610
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, it's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x642
STRING: [Fal] “You're surprised at the fact that I don't have many
things, aren't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: [Chris] “Pretty much...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x676
STRING: [Fal] “But, I have everything I need so I don't really feel
any inconvenience.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x696
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b4
STRING: [Fal] “So, we still have some time until midday; shall we
practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d4
STRING: [Chris] “Already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x706
STRING: [Fal] “The only thing I need to do now is practice, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71c
STRING: [Chris] “That's true...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x746
STRING: It may have been best to just focus exclusively on that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x752
STRING: Other feelings shouldn't have been necessary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75e
STRING: [Chris] “So, where should I set up my Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x790
STRING: [Fal] “Where you are is fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a6
STRING: [Chris] “Then, shall we begin?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: [Fal] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x852
STRING: [Fal] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x868
STRING: Taking a large breath and exhaling, Fal took a drink
from her cup that was sitting on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89a
STRING: [Fal] “I guess that's about it for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8da
STRING: Besides taking a quick break at lunchtime to eat some
sandwiches, we basically hadn't taken anything that
constituted an actual break,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 8da
STRING: and spent the whole afternoon until dinnertime
practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: My body had become quite tired, and there were a
number of times when we were playing that my fingers
didn't move properly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x906
STRING: The room was only slightly warm as we hadn't been
using the heater, but our clothes were now dampened
with sweat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: [Fal] “Now that we're finished, I'd better get cooking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94e
STRING: [Chris] “We can just make something with the leftover
bread, you know...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: [Fal] “What... You want the stew that's been slow
boiling since morning to go to waste?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a0
STRING: [Chris] “Since this morning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d2
STRING: [Fal] “The meat isn't exactly the best, but it should taste
great after being boiled properly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f2
STRING: [Chris] “But, aren't you tired...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: [Fal] “It's okay, I'm doing it because I want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa48
STRING: Saying this, she then walked off in the direction of the
kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa60
STRING: Despite the fact she was tired, she still moved about
energetically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa76
STRING: It was not something that I was capable of doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa90
STRING: “I'm doing it because I want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9c
STRING: How many times had I heard her say these words?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa8
STRING: I wondered if there was anything that she actually
disliked?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab6
STRING: When people asked her to do something, she accepted
with a smile. She worked a part time job between the
gaps in her school life, and didn't mind cooking because
she liked to do so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad8
STRING: It was the same when she made a copy of her score for
me; when she said she would cook dinner just now; and
when she sang.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb00
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry to keep you waiting. I think it came out well,
though!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: [Fal] “Please, eat up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3e
STRING: What had I been doing with myself?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4c
STRING: The more I learned about her, the more pathetic I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb66
STRING: And...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: To put it positively, it was an interest...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9a
STRING: To put it negatively, it was a fondness...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: ...That I was starting to feel towards Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: We shouldn't have been doing anything besides
practicing, but here we were, doing something that
wasn't practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe8
STRING: [Fal] “What shall we do tomorrow? I suppose it would
be okay to pray at the church sometime...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc12
STRING: Was I not looking forward to tomorrow?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc30
STRING: [Fal] “But, there's actually a different place I'm more
interested in going to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc50
STRING: I just nodded like a fool, ate another mouthful, and said
I'd let her decide.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc78
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, that reminds me. I have two tickets to a
recital. I'd like to go to that too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: I tried not to acknowledge my feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcca
STRING: I tried to not ruin our relationship.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: I pretended to be indifferent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfe
STRING: I pretended to be happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd18
STRING: And in reality, I was happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd78
STRING: [Fal] “So, does my place again tomorrow work for you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8e
STRING: [Chris] “No problem. You don't mind if we start from
midday, do you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc0
STRING: [Fal] “Of course not, the afternoon is fine. Also, there's
that recital at the concert hall that I want to go to at
three o'clock.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde0
STRING: [Chris] “Sure thing. What kind of recital is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfe
STRING: [Fal] “The alumni from our school gather every Natale
and hold a recital. Didn't you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1e
STRING: [Chris] “I have a feeling I've heard about that before...
Aren't students supposed to get a discount, or
something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5a
STRING: [Fal] “Unfortunately, unlike other recitals, student
concessions aren't provided.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: [Fal] “This is something I wish they'd ask us students
about, but it seems that the number of tickets
themselves is limited, and they are barely sold to
the public.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb4
STRING: [Fal] “And on top of that, preference is given to friends
and family of those in the orchestra, or the higher-ups
and so on from the school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed4
STRING: [Chris] “If that's the case... How did you get tickets?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf06
STRING: [Fal] “Didn't I just say preference is given to friends and
family of the orchestra?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf26
STRING: Fal casually produced two tickets from her bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf32
STRING: [Chris] “You know someone...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf64
STRING: [Fal] “I happen to know a lot of the teachers.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7a
STRING: [Chris] “O-Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf98
STRING: [Fal] “It's times like this that I am glad I helped so many
people out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb8
STRING: [Chris] “You know, that sounds rather calculated.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfea
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, you're terrible!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1000
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: The teachers wouldn't give her the tickets if they just
thought she was simply helping them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1040
STRING: Anyone who had spent any time with Fal would have
known the feeling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104c
STRING: Of wanting to help her out, if there was something that
she wanted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: Fal loved singing, and was always aiming for higher
places.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1064
STRING: She was putting in the effort, and she deserved to reach
those places.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1070
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, I guess it's okay to leave my
Fortelle at home?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ac
STRING: [Fal] “You don't plan to practice at all...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c2
STRING: [Chris] “I was thinking that listening to a good recital
would be one form of practice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: [Chris] “And that, uh... I guess we need to need to do
actual practice, too, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1128
STRING: [Fal] “Exactly. Okay, I'll see you tomorrow, then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1156
STRING: Oh,
come in your uniform, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1162
STRING: [Chris] “In my uniform? Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1194
STRING: [Fal] “Because it's the alumni recital. We need to dress
formally, and since we're students, that means in
uniform.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b4
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I see. Got it. See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d4
STRING: In contrast to how it was in the morning, the streets
were now empty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e0
STRING: After finishing up their shopping, everyone had returned
to their houses, to prepare for prayer with their families.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f6
STRING: I also felt I would like to pray, once I got home.
